statements: SELECT * FROM Target_Organizations;
SELECT Organization_ID, Organization_Name FROM Target_Organizations;
SELECT Organization_Name, Processes_Description FROM Target_Organizations WHERE Organization_ID = 1;
SELECT * FROM Target_Organizations ORDER BY Organization_Name DESC;
SELECT Organization_ID, Structure_Description FROM Target_Organizations WHERE Organization_Name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT Organization_Name, Structure_Description FROM Target_Organizations WHERE Organization_ID = 1;
SELECT * FROM Target_Organizations WHERE Organization_Name LIKE '%Tech%';
SELECT Organization_Name, Processes_Description FROM Target_Organizations WHERE Organization_ID > 5 ORDER BY Organization_Name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS Total_Organizations FROM Target_Organizations;
SELECT Organization_ID, Organization_Name, Structure_Description, Processes_Description FROM Target_Organizations WHERE Organization_ID BETWEEN 3 AND 7;
SELECT * FROM TargetOrganizations;
SELECT organization_name, organization_type FROM TargetOrganizations;
SELECT organization_name, exploit_type, exploit_date FROM TargetOrganizations JOIN ExploitationData ON TargetOrganizations.organization_id = ExploitationData.organization_id;

SELECT organization_name, exploit_description FROM TargetOrganizations JOIN ExploitationData ON TargetOrganizations.organization_id = ExploitationData.organization_id WHERE exploit_type = 'Cyber Attack';

SELECT organization_name, exploit_type, exploit_date FROM TargetOrganizations JOIN ExploitationData ON TargetOrganizations.organization_id = ExploitationData.organization_id ORDER BY exploit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM TargetOrganizations WHERE organization_id = 1;
SELECT organization_name, organization_type FROM TargetOrganizations WHERE organization_type = 'Government';
SELECT organization_id, organization_name, exploit_type FROM TargetOrganizations JOIN ExploitationData ON TargetOrganizations.organization_id = ExploitationData.organization_id;
SELECT exploitation_id, exploitation_date, exploit_description FROM ExploitationData WHERE exploit_type = 'Malware' ORDER BY exploit_date DESC;
SELECT organization_id, COUNT(exploitation_id) AS exploit_count FROM ExploitationData GROUP BY organization_id HAVING exploit_count > 3;
SELECT organization_name, industry, revenue FROM TargetOrganizations;
SELECT * FROM SocialEngineeringData WHERE organization_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT plan_description, target_date FROM ExploitationPlans;
SELECT organization_name, employee_count FROM TargetOrganizations ORDER BY employee_count DESC;
SELECT contact_name, email, phone_number FROM SocialEngineeringData WHERE last_interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM TargetOrganizations WHERE revenue > 100000
SELECT organization_name, industry FROM TargetOrganizations WHERE employee_count < 500 ORDER BY organization_name ASC
SELECT organization_name, revenue, employee_count FROM TargetOrganizations WHERE industry = 'Technology' OR industry = 'Finance' ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT * FROM SocialEngineeringData WHERE last_interaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'

SELECT organization_name, plan_description FROM TargetOrganizations JOIN ExploitationPlans ON TargetOrganizations.organization_id = ExploitationPlans.organization_id WHERE target_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY organization_name ASC
SELECT * FROM TargetOrganizations;
SELECT id, name, industry FROM TargetOrganizations ORDER BY industry ASC;
SELECT * FROM SocialEngineeringReports WHERE success = TRUE;
SELECT id, date, method FROM SocialEngineeringReports ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, target_organization_id, success FROM ExploitationAttempts LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM TargetOrganizations WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT name, employee_count FROM TargetOrganizations ORDER BY employee_count DESC;
SELECT name, industry, employee_count FROM TargetOrganizations WHERE employee_count > 100 ORDER BY industry ASC, employee_count DESC;

SELECT name, industry, employee_count FROM TargetOrganizations INNER JOIN SocialEngineeringReports ON TargetOrganizations.id = SocialEngineeringReports.id WHERE success = TRUE ORDER BY employee_count DESC;

SELECT TargetOrganizations.name AS Organization, Contacts.role AS Role FROM TargetOrganizations JOIN Contacts ON TargetOrganizations.id = Contacts.target_organization_id WHERE Contacts.contact_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT org_name, industry, employees_count FROM Organization;
SELECT emp_name, job_title, salary FROM Employee WHERE salary > 50000;
SELECT dept_name, dept_head FROM Department ORDER BY dept_name DESC;
SELECT emp_name, job_title, salary, dept_name FROM Employee JOIN Department ON Employee.dept_id = Department.dept_id;
SELECT org_name, headquarters_address FROM Organization WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT org_name, industry, employees_count FROM Organization ORDER BY org_name DESC;
SELECT dept_name, dept_head FROM Department WHERE org_id = 5 AND dept_head IS NOT NULL;
SELECT emp_name, job_title, salary FROM Employee WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY salary DESC, emp_name ASC;
SELECT emp_name, email, phone_number FROM Employee JOIN ContactInfo ON Employee.emp_id = ContactInfo.emp_id WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT org_name, breach_date, description FROM Organization JOIN SecurityBreach ON Organization.org_id = SecurityBreach.org_id WHERE breach_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
